name: Refugiving
description:
Taking a job at a refugee support centre, you need to help match up refugees with supporters looking to help.

Created as part of Resist Jam. There are some known issues which I will try and address when I can, but I am on holiday 18th-28th March so it might be a while before I can and before I'm able to respond to any questions.

Art and design by Álvaro Rodríguez: http://www.alvaro-rodriguez.net/
